SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, B.B_CREATE_DATE, B.B_UPDATE_DATE, B.BOARD_COUNT, B.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, M.PROFILE_IMG, B.COMMUNITY_CODE,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" C WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND C.COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N') AS COMMENT_COUNT,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "LIKE" L WHERE L.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) AS LIKE_COUNT,
(SELECT IMG_PATH || IMG_RENAME FROM BOARD_IMG I WHERE I.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND I.IMG_ORDER = 0) AS THUMBNAIL
FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE B.BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND B.COMMUNITY_CODE = #{boardCode} ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC
